query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `refunds` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `customerId` int NOT NULL,
  `rechargeId` int,
  `paymentMethod` enum('pix','card') NOT NULL,
  `amount` int NOT NULL,
  `originalAmount` int NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','completed','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `paymentId` varchar(255),
  `endToEndId` varchar(255),
  `refundId` varchar(255),
  `reason` text,
  `processedBy` int,
  `metadata` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  CONSTRAINT `refunds_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `refund_customer_idx` (`customerId`),
  INDEX `refund_status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `refund_created_at_idx` (`createdAt`),
  INDEX `refund_payment_method_idx` (`paymentMethod`)
)

  INDEX `refund_created_at_idx` (`createdAt`),
  INDEX `refund_payment_method_idx` (`paymentMethod`)
)
